article_title: Costs key in Heartland's ambulance decision

article_metadata.author: Marshall WhiteSt. Joseph News-Press

og.site_name: St. Joseph News-Press and FOX 26 KNPN
og.description: After about 33 years, times change. The local hospital says it can’t continue to operate an ambulance service. It loses too much money.
